decisions.name: Check_Return_Type_Criteria_respective_Process
decisions.label: Check Return Type Criteria respective Process

rules.name: Return_Type_Approval_Process
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 5 AND 7 AND 8) OR (1 AND 2 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6) AND 7 AND 8)
rules.label: Return Type Approval Process

rules.name: Update_Sub_Status_As_Pending_At_SDM
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 ) AND (8 OR 7) AND 9 AND 10 AND 11) OR ((1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6) AND (7 OR 8) AND 9 AND 11 AND 12)
rules.label: Update Sub Status As 'Pending At SDM'

rules.name: Update_Sub_Status_As_Pending_At_Credit_Team
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4) AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Update Sub Status As 'Pending At Credit Team'

rules.name: Update_Sub_Status_As_Pending_At_OM
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7) AND (11 OR 12) AND 13 AND 14 AND 15 AND 17) OR ((3 OR 4 OR 6) AND (8 OR 9 OR 10) AND 14 AND 16 AND 17)
rules.label: Update Sub Status As 'Pending At OM'

rules.name: Update_Sub_Status_As_Pending_At_Sales_Office_Manager
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9
rules.label: Update Sub Status As 'Pending At Sales Office Manager'

rules.name: Update_Sub_Status_As_Pending_At_CFO
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7) AND (8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12) AND 13 AND (14 OR 15) AND 16 AND 17) OR ((1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7) AND (11 OR 12) AND 16 AND 17 AND 18 AND 19)
rules.label: Update Sub Status As 'Pending At CFO'

rules.name: Update_Sub_Status_As_Pending_At_Inspection_Team
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7) AND (8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12) AND 13 AND (14 OR 15 OR 17) AND 16 AND 18) OR ((1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7) AND (11 OR 12) AND 13 AND 16 AND 18 AND 19 AND 20)
rules.label: Update Sub Status As 'Pending At Inspection Team'

rules.name: Notification_to_Logistic_group_Logistic_Operator
rules.label: Notification to Logistic group & Logistic Operator

rules.name: Notification_to_Requester_Quality_Logistics_and_Customer_Service_team
rules.label: Notification to Requester, Quality, Logistics and Customer Service team

rules.name: Update_Sub_Status_As_Pending_At_SOM
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND ( 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7) AND 8 AND 9 AND (10 OR 11)
rules.label: Update Sub Status As 'Pending At SOM'

rules.name: Update_Sub_Status_As_Pending_At_Quality_Team
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND (9 OR 10) AND 11 AND 12 AND 13
rules.label: Update Sub Status As 'Pending At Quality Team'
